Physics (Thermodynamics).subject: Physics (Thermodynamics)
Physics (Thermodynamics).question: A perfect black body has the unique characteristic feature as
options: a good absorber and a good radiator
neither a radiator nor an absorber
Physics (Thermodynamics).answer: a good absorber and a good radiator
Physics (Thermodynamics).explanation: A perfect black body emits and absorbs all colours of light. A good absorber is a good emitter.
